snippet: A.S.F. Fratia Bucharest, a soccer team in the Romanian fifth division, is the only club in its league run on the principles of equality and nondiscrimination.
abstract: ASF Fratia Bucuresti, a soccer team in the Romanian fifth division, is the only club in its league run on the principles of equality and nondiscrimination; team's goalie, Tudorel Mihailescu, has succeeded despite left arm that does not extend beyond elbow.

byline.contributor: Emanuel Rosu and Alina Totti contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A.S.F. Fratia Bucharest, a soccer team in the Romanian fifth division, is the only club in its league run on the principles of equality and nondiscrimination.

headline.main: Built on Brotherhood, Club Lives Up to Name
headline.print_headline: Built on Brotherhood, Club Lives Up to Name
